headline: Caesars Entertainment Third-Quarter Loss Widens as Las Vegas Revenue Declines
summary: The casino operator logged a wider loss in its latest quarter as revenue from its Las Vegas business fell, hurt by weak demand for leisure travel.

headline: Caesars Entertainment (CZR) Q3 Earnings: How Key Metrics Compare to Wall Street Estimates
summary: The headline numbers for Caesars Entertainment (CZR) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended September 2025, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

headline: Visa, Caesars, Mondelez: Afterhours Earnings Roundup
summary: ↗️ Visa’s revenue climbed in its fiscal fourth quarter as healthy consumer spending drove payments volumes higher. Shares edged higher 0.8% afterhours. ↘️Caesars Entertainment shares fell 6% post-market after the casino operator logged a wider loss in its latest quarter as revenue from its Las Vegas business fell.

raw.headline: Visa, Caesars, Mondelez: Afterhours Earnings Roundup

headline: Caesars (CZR) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: As usual, joining me on the call today are Tom Reeg, our CEO; Anthony Carano, our President and Chief Operating Officer; Brett Yunker, our CFO; Eric Hession, President of Caesars Sports and Online; and Charisse Crumbley, Investor Relations.  Regional revenues were up year over year driven by strong returns in Danville and New Orleans and same-store net revenue growth resulting from continued strategic reinvestment in our Caesars Rewards customer database.

Regional revenues were up year over year driven by strong returns in Danville and New Orleans and same-store net revenue growth resulting from continued strategic reinvestment in our Caesars Rewards customer database.

headline: Caesars Entertainment (NASDAQ:CZR) Misses Q3 Sales Expectations, Stock Drops
summary: Hotel and casino entertainment company Caesars Entertainment (NASDAQ:CZR) fell short of the market’s revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, with sales flat year on year at $2.87 billion. Its GAAP loss of $0.27 per share was significantly below analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Caesars Entertainment (CZR) Reports Q3 Loss, Lags Revenue Estimates
summary: Caesars Entertainment (CZR) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -145.45% and -0.68%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Caesars Entertainment: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: RENO, Nev. AP) — Caesars Entertainment, Inc. CZR) on Tuesday reported a loss of $55 million in its third quarter.

headline: Caesars Entertainment, Inc. Reports Third Quarter 2025 Results
summary: LAS VEGAS & RENO, Nev., October 28, 2025--Caesars Entertainment, Inc., (NASDAQ: CZR) ("Caesars," "CZR," "CEI" or the "Company") today reported operating results for the third quarter ended September 30, 2025.
